name: James R. MARTIN v. Grace G. MARTIN, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: James R. MARTIN v. Grace G. MARTIN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joseph M. George, Margolis, George & Port, Uniontown, for appellant.
Michael A. Johnson, Mount Pleasant, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
598 A.2d 28
James R. MARTIN v. Grace G. MARTIN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 26, 1991.
Decided Oct. 30, 1991.
Joseph M. George, Margolis, George & Port, Uniontown, for appellant.
Michael A. Johnson, Mount Pleasant, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
